Text: Is this the cheap Nordic version with mono sound and uneven, faded picture? Made from an old master tape? According to imdb and Amazon, it should have a stereo track.

@Kuthumi
Judging by the description, this is not it.
Sorry 9c7b5a, I know it' frustrating. I'll seed it for awhile if you'll seed it one more time. Sorry some people are such party poopers.....

Digitally restored? Very poor quality for restoration.
Original length is 188, not 172 min. Wrong aspect ratio + letterbox. Subtitles menu doesn't work in some DVD-players.
